text.section: The standards adopted under subsection (a) of this section shall ensure that a lender benefiting from insurance or other credit enhancement provided by the Department is responsible and able to service the loan.

A determination by the Secretary is conclusive if it relates to the eligibility of a project, facility, or undertaking for:
insurance or other credit enhancement; or
other action taken by the Department, in its own name or in the name of the Fund, under this subtitle.
